title: A Question of Motive: Episode 182
description:
Deptford sits on the River Thames in South-East London. It is a bustling place - well, normally - and was home to 69 year old Noel Brown. When he didn't answer his phone for a couple of days his daughter, Marie, went to his home to see what was wrong. But then she also didn't answer calls from her daughter. Why?

In this episode of the UK True Crime Podcast, I examine just what happened in Deptford in December 2017.
